name: ITP - Ground Anchors & Micro Piles
template name: ITP - Ground Anchors & Micro Piles Rev 1

name: Test frequency - Prior to personnel starting
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all crew members are briefed on the CWP
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Signed off CWP
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all drawings are approved and of the latest revision, or written approval from PAB
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - IFC drawings or written approval from PAB
Test frequency - Once prior to works commencing
Conformance Criteria - TRC review and approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Approved SCWMP
1.04 - Method Statements - At least 5 days before commencing works a method statements shall be submitted to the the Design Engineer for review.
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - CPSA
2.01 - Material Compliance - Micro pile tendons, plates and nuts - 57mm DYWIDAG E 150 ksi threadbar, DYWIDAG plates & nuts. Threadbar requires Class 1 corrosion protection.
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 6.1, Table 6.5 of NZTA Bridge Manual, BS 8081:2015
Method/Description - Mill certificate documents for review
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Request for approval
2.02 - Material Compliance - Steel casings & Nelson Studs - G350 LO 273mm diameter x 12.7 CHS, with 19mm diameter x 180mm long Nelson Studs
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 6.1.2, ISO 22477-5
Method/Description - Mill certificate documents for review
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Request for approval

2.03 - Material Compliance - Rock anchors, trumpet plates, bearing plates, nuts & protective caps - 57mm DYWIDAG E 150 ksi threadbar, DYWIDAG plates & nuts. Threadbar requires Class 1 corrosion protection. Trumpet, bearing plate and protective cap to be HDG thickness of 600gm/m²
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 6.2, Table 6.5 of NZTA Bridge Manual, BS 8081:2015
Method/Description - Mill certificate documents for review
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Request for approval
2.04 - Material Compliance - Cement - Cements used for grouting to comply with NZS 3122
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 6.2.2 & NZS 3122
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Request for approval
3.1.1 - Setting Out - Rock Anchors & Micro pIles set out in accordance with IFC construction drawings
Specifications and Standards - IFC Construction drawings
Test frequency - Prior to comencement of works or as required
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Signed pre-pour inspection sheet

3.1.2 - Install 1No Suitability Test Anchor - Test required to confirm the grout to bond strength. Drill & install 75mm diameter 150ksi anchor in 250mm diameter drilled hole. Test location to be confirmed by CPS.
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 8.2.4, Rock Anchor Notes MMA-DES-STR-E1-DRG-1010 & 1015
Test frequency - Prior to comencement of drilling
Conformance Criteria - Drilling, grouting and stressing records for CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Data results
3.1.3 - Install Ground Anchors - Four ground anchors at Abutment A and Eight ground anchors at Abutment B.
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 7.2, Rock Anchor Notes MMA-DES-STR-E1-DRG-1010 & 1015
Conformance Criteria - Drilling, grouting and stressing records for CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Data results
3.1.4 - Install Micro Pile - Twelve Micro piles at Abutment B. 48 total across four pier foundations.
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 7.1, Micro Pile Notes MMA-DES-STR-E1-DRG- 1015 & 1021
Conformance Criteria - Drilling, grouting and stressing records for CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Data results
4.01 - Acceptance Test Ground Anchors - All ground anchors require acceptance testing
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 8.2.5 & 8.2.6, Rock Anchor Notes MMA-DES-STR-E1-DRG- 1010 & 1015
Method/Description - Reaction frame, 200t hydraulic jack and dial gauges
Test frequency - At completion of installation
Conformance Criteria - Testing records, CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Data results
4.02 - Acceptance Test Micro Piles - Seven only micro piles require acceptance testing
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-8999, Clause 8.3.4 & 8.3.5, Micro Pile Notes MMA-DES-STR-E1-DRG- 1015 & 1021
Method/Description - Reaction frame, 200t hydraulic jack and dial gauges
Test frequency - At completion of installation
Conformance Criteria - Testing records, CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Data results
4.03 - Welding Nelson Studs to Micro Pile Casings - At completion of of micro pile testing, all Nelson studs to be site welded onto the micro pile casings
Method/Description - Approved weld proceedure for site welding
Test frequency - At completion of installation
Conformance Criteria - Approved weld proceedure, NDT results
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Inspection report
4.04 - As-built - Final survey required to capture any deviation from IFC and to be used for Redline mark up drawings
Specifications and Standards - MMA-DES-GEO-E1-SPC-9349, Clause 4.3, Table 1
Test frequency - At the completion of works
Conformance Criteria - Survey report, CPS approval
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Survey report
4.05 - Final Handover - Site inspection with bridge builder checking site is ready to handover
Test frequency - At completion of works
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Site record
